abstract: Analysis published in journal The Lancet finds large and costly AIDS prevention program pioneered by Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation in India eight years ago has had mixed results. Analysis is authored by epidemiologists from India and the University of Washington.
snippet: An analysis in The Lancet showed that a prevention program in India worked better in some states than others.
lead_paragraph: An analysis in The Lancet showed that a prevention program in India worked better in some states than others.

headline.main: India: Gates Foundation’s AIDS Program in India Has Made Uneven Progress Over 8 Years
headline.print_headline: India: Gates Foundation’s AIDS Program in India Has Made Uneven Progress Over 8 Years
headline.seo: AIDS Program’s Progress in India Is Uneven
